item.description:
Hey salsa Fans:

Join me for a fun night of dancing at Enigma's.  We should get there at 8:30pm to hang out for a bit before the class. I will be wearing a black fedora hat and will be standing near the entrance.

Here are the details:

"Join 150+ dancers in one of Boston's favorite salsa hotspots! Make new friends and dance till 2am in the new exclusive club room at Fire + Ice in Harvard Square. Complete with club lighting, air conditioning, high end speakers embedded throughout the room, and not one, but two specially installed wood floors just for dancers. Enigma Club is the only latin club featuring two rooms: a salsa main room opening at 9:30pm for lessons and dancing, and the NEW Bachata Lounge, opening at 11:45pm (or earlier if available). Your salsa and bachata soul will thank you. Not to mention two swank bars (with reasonably priced drinks), super friendly wait staff, and even appetizers available from the kitchen in case you get hungry.

 


50 Church St, Harvard Square,
Cambridge -

Regular Cover: $12 ($15 for live music events) includes:

  • Salsa/Bachata/Merengue Lessons @ 9:30pm (lessons change weekly)
  • Social dancing till 2am
  • Air Conditioned club room
  • Music by DJ D. Martinez, DJ Rey G, DJ Saoko, DJ Hernan + more

    All Ages! 2 Full Bars (21+), Appetizers
    Dress Code: Casual to Sexy
    No partner needed
  • Brought to you by:Salsa Matei Dance Company

See you there !!

-Angel S.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a black fedora hat and will be standing near the entrance.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa Dancing at Enigma !!!
